title: Bière & Code Paris
description: A welcoming space for developers, engineers, and tech enthusiasts to explore ideas, share knowledge, and connect over great conversation and craft beer.

monthly.title: Monthly Meetups
monthly.description: Every month, we gather for tech talks, project demos, and open networking. Typical format: 6pm arrival, 6:30 lightning talks, 7pm open discussion. Bring your projects, questions, or just your curiosity.

updates.title: Community Updates
updates.description: Event recaps, member spotlights, tech trends, and project showcases. Weekly posts keep you connected to what our community is building and learning together.

community.title: Open to All
community.description: All languages, frameworks, and experience levels welcome. From students to senior engineers, career-switchers to founders—if you're curious about tech, you belong here.

firstTime.title: First Time?
firstTime.subtitle: Here's What to Expect
points: No registration needed—just show up and introduce yourself
All skill levels welcome, from beginners to experts
Relaxed atmosphere: bring projects, questions, or just curiosity
Make friends, find collaborators, or simply enjoy good conversation

learnTogether.title: Learn Together
learnTogether.description: Share knowledge, discuss emerging technologies, and explore diverse perspectives. From debugging sessions to architecture debates, we grow by learning from each other.

relax.title: Relax & Connect
relax.description: Tech doesn't have to be intense. Meet in a casual setting where you can be yourself, build genuine friendships, and find your work-life balance in the community.

network.title: Grow Your Network
network.description: Connect with fellow developers, discover collaboration opportunities, find mentors or mentees. Some of Paris's best tech friendships started over a beer.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Meet the team behind Bière & Code Paris.

raph.bio: Senior Developer Evangelist at Defang and a serial entrepreneur with deep roots in the startup ecosystem. As the founder of Ephemere Creative and Tembo Tech, Raph combines technical expertise with a passion for community building and mentorship, bridging the gap between complex cloud technologies and the developers who use them.

miguel.bio: Senior Software Engineer at Gencove (NYC), specializing in high-scale Cloud Infrastructure and Backend systems for genomic analysis. An active open-source contributor and former digital nomad, Miguel brings a global perspective and strong entrepreneurial background to engineering, having built and launched successful products across multiple platforms.

footer.mission: Building a welcoming tech community in Paris, one beer at a time.
